H0.text: Axis is the term for what the earth rotates on.

H1.text: Radius is the term for what the Earth rotates on.

H2.text: Tip is the term for what the earth rotates on.

H3.text: Compass is the term for what the earth rotates on.

A4.text: The North Pole, also known as the Geographic North Pole or Terrestrial North Pole, is the point in the Northern Hemisphere where Earth's axis of rotation meets its surface.
